review: Navigating Amazon Prime video content is not as easy as Netflix.  It is not possible to easily navigate amazon prime music, you have yo add things to your library online to use it.  There is no support for Google play music, which is where music is.Video quality seems quite good.  Audio quality is good, except for a pop when starting playback of  video with certain Dolby auidio formats enabled (otherwise I had no auidio issues).Overall, amazon has just done a poor job on their user interface and usability for music and video on the fire TV stick and on their android apps.  I really have little interest in using the product as a result of the poor navigation of amazon prime video content; this makes the fire tv stick mostly a waste of money for me.

review: I had high hopes for the Amazon firestick since I am a prime member and my Apple TV stopped working after a year and a half.  However, the firestick is a disappointment.
